income_messages:
From: f********o@currently.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-20 19:27:25
SUBJECT: From the desk of Dr. Frank Add
From the desk of Dr. Frank Addo.
Chairman, Contract, Awarding & Auditing
Committee - ECOWAS, Accra Ghana.
I am Dr. Frank Addo, chairman of the contract-awarding & auditing committee of
the economic community of west African states (ECOWAS) with its fund
headquarters in Accra Ghana. I am making this contact with you based on the
committee's need for an individual/company who is willing to assist us with a
solution to a money transfer.
This amount, $23 M represents the balance of the total contract value executed
on behalf of ECOWAS for supply of hospital equipment from foreign contracting
firm, which the officials over-invoiced deliberately, of which the actual sum
has been paid.
Should you be willing to assist us in the transaction? Your share of the sum
will be 30% of the $23 million, 65% for us and 5% for taxation and miscellaneous
expenses. 
To enable us commence, you should provide the followings for immediate
kickoff of this deal if it interests you; your company's names with complete
address, tel. and fax numbers.
Please send your respond to my private email ( 
frank2addo@currently.com
 ) more
details.
Thank you and God bless, as I wait in anticipation of your fullest cooperation.
Yours Faithfully,
Dr. Frank Addo.
From: f********o@currently.com
To: nu45874@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-27 19:40:53
SUBJECT: Re: From the desk of Dr. Frank Add
Dear Sir,
Thanks for your response, i won't be surprise if you are skeptical over this deal, which might sound strange since we have not met face to face before but believe me god's way is different from that of human beings. This is the reason why i need to put you through to the true picture of this risk free deal which mainly exist in part of Africa here where corruption and looting is the order of the day hence government officials in high positions uses this means to divert monies abroad by foreigners like you for their future investment if they retire or been fired from office since our stay in office does not last long due to changes in government which always allow re-shuffling of offices. I want you to benefit from this opportunity, which i believe my contact to you among every person in the whole world is divine. Before contacting you, i had series of prayers and fasting for divine direction to an honest and trustworthy person who will not betray me once the fund is in her custody. please note that your presence might be needed to sign the fund release order document here in Accra
Here are brief information about this deal:
Description:  
We are highly placed committee members of Ecowas which i am presently the head primarily for contract awards, evaluation, vetting, appraisal and approval of the payment which will be paid to you subsequently. In the course of discharging our duties, we intentionally inflated contract payments of the original contractors. After the original contractors has been duly paid off their contract amount, it is then left with the inflated sum of $23 million USD. Hence my colleagues and me has decided to look for a trusted foreigner who will assist us safeguard this fund into his/her account. For your assistance in this deal, you are entitled to 30% of the total fund, while 65% will be kept on trust by you till we arrive your country and 5% will be used to defray any incidental charges we may incur in the course of the transfer.  
Note:  
The trust deposed on you is enormous hence i need your committed co-operation, sincerely and transparency, you should also take this transfer as the highest priority in your life since this transaction will definitely change our life at the end and we will be rich forever in the name of god. Remember that success of this deal will also depend on how secrecy it is kept no matter your relationship with the person even when the fund has been confirmed in your account as we will not like anything that will jeopardizes our long stay with Ecowas. Keep all the documents of this transaction only to your self until the transaction is over which after the sharing of the fund, all the documents has to be destroyed to avoid tracing. Do not worry; i am here to monitor the situation.
Procedure:  
Soon as an application which i will send to you after i receive your further acceptance is approved by Ecowas contract payment bureau,through Ecowas fund unit after proper scrutiny/verification has been conducted, Ecowas contract payment bureau will then inform you officially, after which Ecowas banker will be instructed to wire the approved fund into your account. The paying bank will also contact you officially with legal documents of the transfer that will confirm you as the bonafide owner of the fund and will equally fax the transfer documents to your receiving bank to put off any doubt on the source of the fund, and will further convince them that the fund is legal contract money not drug/money laundering/terrorist related fund hence you should not disclose to your bank about the incoming fund as your bank will contact you once the fund reaches your account.  
Proposal:  
Our dream is after this fund has been successfully transferred into your account, we and our families will come over to your country to share the fund according to the agreed percentages and subsequently invest our share of the fund in your country subject to your supervision where we will live throughout our life. Please your major role is to research on where we will invest our share of the fund, as we are civil servants and have little or no knowledge about business enterprises. I want to re-assure you that this transaction is 100% risk free as it has been covered from any act of inquiry from whatsoever but we once more solicit your confidentiality in this deal as we will not like anything that will jeopardizes the progress of this transaction.  
Legality:  
To stand the better chance of getting the fund approved on your behalf, hence we have chosen to follow the official process of processing application in our organization so that once the payment file is brought for scrutiny by the Ecowas approval unit, we will have 100% chances of getting the approval. To make our claim authentic i will have to register your company name at Ecowas contractor's registry as a contractor with Ecowas as at the time the contract was executed. The arrangement to do this has been perfected. This is one of the criteria needed before getting contract from Ecowas.please if you are not going to participate full in this transaction, you are free to say no now, that the transaction has not been documented on your name as we will not like any disappointment in between the transaction rather lets us be ordinary friends.if this deal further interest you, to strengthen the security network, please lets us take our communication code word to be "progress" when you or i call you.if you wish to find out further about the existence of our organization, but i advice you not to contact anybody concerning this transaction in this site since you are aware that this is a deal known only between me and you. If authority of Ecowas happens to know, i will not only sacked from office without benefit rather we will be prosecuted. We have to do everything to protect this deal, as here lies our future. I will send you an application that you are going to send to Ecowas for the transaction as soon as you respond to this email.
Hoping to hear from you.
Best regards
outbound_messages:
From: nu45874@l******s.email
To: f********o@currently.com
Time: 2023-04-20 19:27:34
SUBJECT: Re: From the desk of Dr. Frank Add
Dear Dr. Frank Addo,
Thank you for your email. I am interested in learning more about this opportunity to assist with money transfer for ECOWAS. However, before I can provide any further information, I would like to know more about the specifics of the contract and the hospital equipment that was supplied. 
Could you please provide me with more details on the contract, including the name of the foreign firm that supplied the equipment and the total contract value? 
Once I have this information, I will be better able to determine if my company is able to assist with the money transfer. 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Angie
